TabControl.name: ABot
TabControl.OnSelect: switch ${This.SelectedTab} { Case Main UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Healer UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Combat UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Triggers UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Class UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break }

TabControl.name: MainSubTab
TabControl.OnSelect: switch ${This.SelectedTab} { Case MainT UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case BuffWatch UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Sell UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Trash UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Logs UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Mobs UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Class UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break }

checkbox.Name: doLoot
checkbox.Text: Loot Corpses (Loot all unless checked below)

checkbox.Name: doautoSellchk
checkbox.Text: Auto Add to Sell List when you Manually Sell

checkbox.Name: DoByPassVGAHeals
checkbox.Text: Bypass VGA Heal Script (use my Custom)

checkbox.Name: doPushAgro
checkbox.Text: Push Agro to (Tank) when Mob Not on (Tank)

Text.Name: lbBMSingleTargetLifeTap1
Text.AutoTooltip: This spell will be used to regain health if it is available.

Text.Name: lbBMSingleTargetLifeTap2
Text.AutoTooltip: This spell will be used to regain health if your primary single target life tap is not available.

Text.Name: lbBMBloodUnionSingleTargetHOT
Text.AutoTooltip: Your instant cast blood union based HOT.
